message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time price of $14,000. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a great deal on something that's worth $15,000 to you!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you coming down to $14,000, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to consider $13,000?  It's still a good deal for you, and it fits better with my budget.

I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13,500. It's a fair compromise that should work for both of us.
